creator: Genius Studio Japan Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Synopsis

As a self-proclaimed loner, joining a school club is the last thing you’d want to do. That is, until a teacher forces you to join one. Not just any club, but a club where you get to interact with people on a daily basis!

The real challenge doesn’t involve the after-school activities. Now that you are part of the Fixers Club, you must learn to befriend your fellow members—three girls with personalities that clash with your own. Capture their hearts in this touching high school rom-com, all while learning the truth behind your mysterious past. Can you outrun destiny and steer yourself along the path of love?

Then there’s also the blood-covered ropes…

Nazuna, the Enigmatic President

As head of the Fixers Club, Nazuna acts twice her age. Despite having a secretive side, her dynamic attitude makes her the ideal leader. Can you promise her a lifetime of happiness, or will you leave her hanging?

Misa, the Introverted Tsundere

Armed with a strong desire to improve her social skills, Misa wants to present herself as an approachable person. But when it comes to you, she prefers to keep her distance. Can you change her mind, or will you suffer from a broken heart?

Rinko, the Spirited Rich Girl

Rinko knows how to capture your attention. One minute she’s sweet and outgoing, the next she’s devilish and seductive. It’s almost a crime not to fall in love with this transfer student! Will you accept her once you discover her dark side? Only one way to find out…
descriptionShort: Can you outrun destiny and steer yourself along the path of love?
